review_text: The small portable heater exceeded my expectations. Despite its compact size, it efficiently warms up the room quickly. The adjustable thermostat and multiple heat settings provide versatility, making it suitable for various preferences. Its low noise level is a definite plus, ensuring a quiet and comfortable heating experience. The safety features, including overheat protection, offer peace of mind. Overall, a reliable and practical choice for personal heating needs.

review_text: The anti-tipping feature is really pleasant to have when you have a cat that knocks things over like it owns the place. It also has a limit switch, so if it gets too hot, it will also cut off. It's a space heater; it turns electricity to heat, which is 100% efficient, no matter what brand or type you have. I like this design because I can keep only my bedroom warm overnight during the (somewhat moderate Florida) winter when things get down to 45F without worrying about it cooking me.My only gripe is that the fan is kind of loud, and it is ALWAYS running, even when it has satisfied heating. It will heat to 72, and then the element will cut out, and then the fan will cool the element... and then nothing else happens. I would really like the fan to only run when the element is hot, because when it's confined to a small room without a rug or any sound dampening material at all, it's not as quiet as one would hope. This is not a deal breaker, but if this company produced a space heater that would automatically turn the fan off, I would upgrade to that heater in a heartbeat.

review_text: Tho it‚Äôs not recommended, I bought this heater to warm up our bathroom in the morning for my wife who gets up a couple hours after me.For our bathroom, it takes just a few minutes to heat up the room so it‚Äôs pretty effective. For our bedroom, it take a a little longer but still does the trick.It is pretty easy to use. I set the temperature and put it on eco mode to make so it doesn‚Äôt overheat the bathroom. Then I‚Äôll set a timer for a couple hours to turn off so that it doesn‚Äôt feel too warm in the morning.The eco mode will switch between high heat, low heat, and just the fan as needed depending on what temperature you set in the heater.We‚Äôve never had the heater overheat. The decide itself doesn‚Äôt seem to get dangerous hot. Overall, we are very satisfied with this heater.

review_text: This is only the second day with this heater.  So far it is a great little heater.I purchased it to take the chill off a work station in my garage, which is no easy task in new york in January. I received it yesterday and tried it for the first time last night. It not only took the chill off it kept me so warm I had to turn it to a lower setting. I used it today with the same result.So, so far it is a great little heater.
